ButtonActivateEmail: Click here to activate your email address
ButtonJoin: Click here to join the portal
ButtonSelectPricingPlans: Select the Pricing Plans Right Now
Item3rdParty: Tip #5:  Connect your portal with the 3rd-party services
Item3rdPartyText: Let your team members use Facebook, Twitter, Google or LinkedIn to sign in. Link up your portal  with Box, Dropbox, OneDrive and Google to transfer your documents. Connect DocuSign to use  e-signature, Twilio - for VoIP, Bitly - to shorten links and Firebase to get notifications when you're offline.
ItemAddEmailAccount: Add your email account to ${LetterLogoText} Mail and manage all correspondence in one place
ItemAddFilesCreatWorkspace: Connect cloud storages you use to ONLYOFFICE to create a single workspace for all your docs.
ItemAddTeamlabMail: Add your email account to ${LetterLogoText} Mail
ItemAdjustRegionalSettingsText: Choose the language for your web-office interface and set the correct time zone. It's particularly important for the notifications and the correct calendar work. Go to Settings >> Common >> Customization.
ItemARMText: Set up individual access rights for each contact - person or company.
ItemBrandYourWebOfficeText: Change the portal logo settings following Settings >> Common >> White Label and uploading your company's logos of the specified sizes. To change the default portal title displayed on the Welcome page, go to Settings >> Common >> Customization >> Welcome Page Settings.
ItemCoAuthoringDocuments: Explore different ways of co-authoring documents - real-time co-editing, chat, comments, review.
ItemCreateWorkspaceDocs: Create a single workspace for all your docs
ItemCustomizationText: Set up CRM system according to your company needs. Customize user fields, set opportunity stages and task categories, create the company profile to include this information into invoices, etc.
ItemCustomizeWebOfficeInterfaceText: Name the portal groups, its members and their activities following Settings >> Common >> Customization >> Team Template. Select the color theme that best suits your company brand.
ItemEnterpriseDocsTips1: Tip #1. Use the Real-time co-editing feature to speed up the interaction process when specifying details or proofreading a document. Choose between two co-editing modes - Fast when you see changes as your co-author is typing or Strict when the changes are shown only after saving the document.
ItemEnterpriseDocsTips2: Tip #2. Use the Version History option to check the changes made to a file by you and your teammates or see who made the specific edits.
ItemEnterpriseDocsTips3: Tip #3. Use the Review feature to avoid manual tracking changes and merging. Grant a quick access to your document for reviewing and let others suggest changes without actually editing the document. Easily accept or reject suggested changes.
ItemEnterpriseDocsTips4: Tip #4. Share documents with other users or people. Attach documents as links to your email to reduce the mail traffic.
ItemEnterpriseDocsTips5: Tip #5. Use the Mail Merge function to create a set of personalized messages or a templates and save time you usually spend on writing the same text several times.
ItemEnterpriseDocsTips6: Tip #6. Download free ONLYOFFICE Desktop Editors to work on documents without Internet connection. Note that the app can be connected to your ONLYOFFICE portal to access documents stored there.
ItemEnterpriseDocsTips7: Tip #7. Download ONLYOFFICE Documents app and install it on your iOS device to work with documents anywhere, anytime, even on the go.
ItemFeatureCommunityText: Create an internal social network with blogs, forums, polls, etc. to organize an efficient two-way communication. Moreover it allows you to discover hidden talents, creative persons, able to organize and lead.
ItemFeatureDocCoAuthoringText: Share docs with your team and edit them together in real time. Add comments and interact with your co-authors using the integrated chat.
ItemFeatureEmailSignatureText: Create an effective email signature using text, picture, link or even generated HTML code.
ItemFeatureFolderForAttsText: Set up a folder to automatically save all the future attachments into it.
ItemFeatureGanttChartText: Define processes, priorities and dependencies to help your team to better perform tasks. Monitor progress and perform changes in time using a visualized picture of your project.
ItemFeatureLinksVSAttachmentsText: Insert a link to a file instead of attaching it and manage access rights to it to reduce the mail traffic and send a large file.
ItemFeatureMailboxAliasesText: Use the aliases if you need to change your email address without creating a new mailbox.
ItemFeatureMailGroupsText: Creating a mail group is a great way to make certain emails available for a group of users. No need to duplicate messages, which incredibly reduces the mail storage space.
ItemFeatureProjectDiscussionsText: Discuss issues - any sort of problems and outstanding questions that occur - with your team to find a better solution together.
ItemFeatureTalkText: Use chat rooms to create a conference in real time, mailing lists to send a message to many people at once, notifications to follow news.
ItemFeatureTips1CoEditingText: Tip #1. Use the Real-time Co-editing feature to avoid the manual tracking changes and merging and speed up the interaction process when specifying details or proofreading a document.
ItemFeatureTips2VersionHistoryText: Tip #2. Use the Version History option to check the changes made to a file by you and your teammates or see who made the specific edits.
ItemFeatureTips3ShareDocsText: Tip #3. Share documents with other users or people outside your cloud office. Attach documents as links to your email to reduce the mail traffic.
ItemFeatureTips3ShareDocsTextEnterprise: Tip #3. Share documents with other users. Attach documents as links to your email to reduce the mail traffic.
ItemFeatureTips4CloudStoragesText: Tip #4. Integrate your Web Office with different *Cloud Storages* to manage all your documents inside the portal.
ItemFeatureTips4MailMergeText: Tip #4. Use the Mail Merge function to create a set of personalized messages or a templates and save time you usually spend on writing the same text several times.
ItemFeatureTips5iOSText: Tip #5. Download ${LetterLogoText} Documents app and install it on your iOS device to work with documents anywhere, anytime, even on the go.
ItemIntegrateIM: Integrate your IM client with ${LetterLogoText} talk and stay tuned
ItemLinkWithProjectsText: Working on an opportunity might require the involvement of the whole team of the specialists. Create a project and link it with the opportunity to coordinate the work more efficiently.
ItemMailIntegrationText: Keep all the information about contacts, opportunities and cases in one place including email correspondence. Link a conversation or a single message with a necessary CRM element.
ItemModulesAndTools: Tip #4: Select the ${LetterLogoText} modules and tools
ItemModulesAndToolsText: ${LetterLogoText} provides you with a complete set of tools for office collaboration allowing you to enable those you need for your work following  Settings >> Common >> Modules & Tools. The disabled ones will be hidden.
ItemOpensourceDocsTips1: Tip #1. Use the Real-time Co-editing feature to speed up the interaction process when specifying details or proofreading a document. Choose between two co-editing modes - Fast when you see changes as your co-author is typing or Strict when the changes are shown only after saving the document.

ItemSecureAccess: Tip #5: Secure the access to your web-office
ItemSecureAccessText: ${LetterLogoText} portals are hosted on Amazon Web Services, one of the most protected cloud computing platforms today, but you can always add an extra security layer. Set the password strength and enable 2-factor authentication to protect your data. To do so, go to Settings >> Security >> Portal Access
ItemTryOnlineDocEditor: Try full-featured online document editing in your browser
ItemUploadCrmContacts: Upload CRM contacts to ${LetterLogoText} to access them everywhere
ItemUploadCrmContactsCsv: Upload CRM contacts from a csv. file
ItemVoIPText: Receive incoming calls from your customers and make outgoing calls right from a web browser using virtual numbers provided by the Twilio service.
ItemWebToLeadText: Create and embed the contact form into your company website. Gather new lead information automatically and gain more prospective customers effortlessly.

pattern_after_creation1:
Dear $UserName,

The cloud office for your team is already created at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". It's time to invite your teammates to join it. 
The easiest way to do that is to distribute the invitation link using the *Invite users to portal* option.

$GreenButton

If you have access to the detailed contact information of the people, add your teammates manually one by one using the *Create New...* button in the *People* module. "Learn more >>":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/gettingstarted/people.aspx#AddingUsers_block"

Or add users all at once from:
    "your Yahoo or Google account":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-web.aspx",
    "your mail client address book":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-mail-client.aspx",
    "a CSV file":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-csv.aspx". 

Finally, you can allow your teammates self-registration configuring the *Trusted Mail Domain* settings. "Learn more >>":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/gettingstarted/configuration.aspx#TrustedDomain"

Once added, manage their access rights. For more information about ARM, visit our "Help Center":"https://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com".

Truly yours,
ONLYOFFICE Team
"www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

pattern_after_registration_personal1:
$HeaderStart Welcome to ${LetterLogoText} personal $HeaderEnd

You have just created your personal office in the cloud.

It's a desktopless workspace available in your browser, where you can store documents, work with them anywhere providing access to your friends or colleagues.

$FrameStart ${LetterLogoText} is compatible with Microsoft Office™ document formats. We promise to relieve you from formatting fidelity headache. $FrameEnd

$StrongStart Here are the basic features for a quick start: $StrongEnd

$MarkerStart Upload files from your computer or create new. $MarkerEnd

$MarkerStart Edit *.docx*, *.xlsx* and *.pptx* documents online. $MarkerEnd

$MarkerStart Download files in any popular format. $MarkerEnd

$SignatureStart Have a good start!

Sincerely,
ONLYOFFICE team $SignatureEnd
pattern_after_registration_personal14:
$HeaderStart A few tips for freelance work $HeaderEnd

${LetterLogoText} provides a good number of features for freelance community whether you are a contractor or hiring somebody for a project. Let's see what might be of the most interest for you:

$MarkerStart Read Only/Full Access files sharing $MarkerEnd

$MarkerStart Real-time collaborative editing and commenting $MarkerEnd

$MarkerStart Version & revision control $MarkerEnd

There is no need to download files and send them via email. Simply share them from your cloud office and collaborate wherever you are.

$StrongStart Need more collaborative functionality? $StrongEnd

${LetterLogoText} business edition is free for a 30 day trial period and provides you with even more opportunities for freelance or distant work. For instance, you can create and submit invoices to your clients. Would like to learn more? Proceed to our "CRM overview":"http://www.onlyoffice.com/crm.aspx".

$SignatureStart Sincerely,
ONLYOFFICE team $SignatureEnd
pattern_after_registration_personal21:
$HeaderStart Give a try to ${LetterLogoText} for teams $HeaderEnd

In case you need to collaborate with a team or manage a project, we offer you to try the business edition of ${LetterLogoText}. In addition to the online editors and document management features, you'll be able to:

$MarkerStart control tasks and use Gantt chart in the Project Management module; $MarkerEnd

$MarkerStart track sales, relations with customers and create invoices in CRM; $MarkerEnd

$MarkerStart manage all your email accounts in one Email aggregator $MarkerEnd

and do many other operations that aim at creating a single collaborative work space and your teammates. See details "here":"http://www.onlyoffice.com/highlights.aspx".

For a start you can create a trial account that is free for 30 days. It doesn't have any functional restrictions.

$SignatureStart Sincerely,
ONLYOFFICE team $SignatureEnd
pattern_after_registration_personal7:
$HeaderStart Connect your favorite cloud storage to ${LetterLogoText} $HeaderEnd

It has been a week since you created your cloud office, so we believe it's time to unveil some beneficial features you might have missed.

$FrameStart Connect Dropbox, Google Drive, Box or OneDrive cloud storage to ${LetterLogoText} and create a single workspace for all your documents. You'll be able to edit external files by means of ${LetterLogoText} without any additional downloads. See details how to do it "here":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/tipstricks/add-resource.aspx". $FrameEnd

$StrongStart Need more document management options? $StrongEnd

Our "business edition":"http://www.onlyoffice.com/" is free for a 30 day trial period and provides extended document management opportunities together with a business toolset:

$MarkerStart Project documentation tracking. $MarkerEnd

$MarkerStart Close integration with CRM and Email. $MarkerEnd

$MarkerStart Individual and group sharing. $MarkerEnd

Interested? Learn more about "${LetterLogoText} for business":"http://www.onlyoffice.com/document-management.aspx".

$SignatureStart Sincerely,
ONLYOFFICE team $SignatureEnd

Dear $UserName,

It’s likely that ONLYOFFICE is a new experience for you so we figured that you might like some tips and tricks to get you started.
$TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItemsBtm
$GreenButton
   
Done. It's time to invite teammates to your web-office!

For more information we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"https://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com".

Note that all members of your team can use ONLYOFFICE Desktop Editors to work on documents offline. The application is free and can be connected to your ONLYOFFICE portal. "Download now":"http://www.onlyoffice.com/desktop.aspx"

Let your team also use ONLYOFFICE Documents app to manage and edit docs on iOS devices Get it on "App Store":"https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/onlyoffice-documents/id944896972"

Truly yours,
ONLYOFFICE Team
"www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

Hello, $UserName!

You can customize ONLYOFFICE for your needs, for example:

$TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItemsBtm

$GreenButton
   
Done. It's time to invite teammates to your web-office!

More information in our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}".

Let your team members use Facebook, Twitter, Google or LinkedIn to sign in. Link up your portal with Box, Dropbox, OneDrive and Google to transfer your documents. Connect DocuSign to use e-signature, Twilio - for VoIP, Bitly - to shorten links and Firebase to get notifications when you're offline.
Uploading your company's logos in the Control Panel. To change the default portal title displayed on the Welcome page, go to Settings >> Common >> Customization >> Welcome Page Settings.
Name the portal groups, its members and their activities following Settings >> Common >> Customization >> Team Template. Select the color theme that best suits your company brand.
Enable instruments you need for work following Settings >> Common >> Modules & Tools. The disabled ones will be hidden.
Choose the language and set the correct time zone. It's particularly important for the notifications and the correct calendar work. Go to Settings >> Common >> Customization.
pattern_enterprise_admin_invite_teammate:
Dear $UserName,

The cloud office for your team is already created at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". It's time to invite your teammates to join it. 
The easiest way to do that is to distribute the invitation link using the *Invite users to portal* option.

$GreenButton

If you have access to the detailed contact information of the people, add your teammates manually one by one using the *Create New...* button in the *People* module. "Learn more >>":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/gettingstarted/people.aspx#AddingUsers_block"

Or add users all at once from:
    "your LDAP database":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/server/windows/community/ldap-settings.aspx",
    "your Yahoo or Google account":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-web.aspx",
    "your mail client address book":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-mail-client.aspx",
    "a CSV file":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-csv.aspx". 

Once added, manage their access rights. For more information about ARM, visit our "Help Center":"https://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com".

Truly yours,
ONLYOFFICE Team
"www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

Hello, $UserName!

Your cloud office is ready at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". It's time to invite your teammates!

The easiest way to add your team is to import the necessary users and groups from an LDAP Server (e.g. OpenLDAP Server or Microsoft Active Directory). The LDAP settings are available in your Control Panel. Instructions are available in our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}/server/windows/community/ldap-settings.aspx".

You can also distribute the invitation link using the Invite users to portal option or add your teammates manually one by one using the *Create New...* button in the *People* module or export users from:

pattern_enterprise_admin_welcome:
Dear $UserName,

ONLYOFFICE provides you with security tools that allow you to:

- Turn on HTTPS to keep your portal data secure;

- Backup your portal data on a regular basis to avoid any data-loss;

- Track login history and receive the audit trail data;

- Enable two-factor authentication. 

To turn on two-factor authentication, connect one of the service providers in Settings >> Integration >>Third-Party Authorization, and then go to Settings >> Security >> Two-factor authentication to enable the feature

The rest of the tools are available in Control Panel, where you can also change the default portal logos, import users from your LDAP server and check for available ONLYOFFICE updates.

$GreenButton

For more information we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"https://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com".

Truly yours,
ONLYOFFICE Team
"www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"
pattern_enterprise_admin_welcome_v10:
Hello, $UserName!

Here’s what you can do to make your web-office even more secure:

*Get an SSL certificate* if you are going to provide not only local but also external portal access for your users. Generate a new signed certificate in the Control Panel or purchase one from the provider you trust.

*Enable automatic backups* in the Control Panel. We also recommend that you use third-party services and make a backup copy of the server with ONLYOFFICE installed from time to time. Instructions in our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}/server/controlpanel/enterprise/backup-restore.aspx".

*Adjust portal security settings*: restrict access using IP whitelisting, specify trusted mail domains, set password length and more. "More information >>":"${__HelpLink}/server/enterprise/configure-enterprise.aspx" 

*Enable 2-factor authentication* via SMS or authenticator app. Instructions "here":"${__HelpLink}/guides/two-factor-authentication.aspx".

*Use LDAP for access centralization*. Easily import the necessary users and groups from your LDAP server (e.g. OpenLDAP Server or Microsoft Active Directory) to your portal. Learn more "here":"${__HelpLink}/server/windows/community/ldap-settings.aspx".

*Use own SMPT server*. By default notifications for ONLYOFFICE Enterprise Edition users (for example, if they are granted access to a document) are provided by means of standard ONLYOFFICE SMPT server. Configure your own SMTP server so that your notifications won’t pass through any third-party server. "Instructions >>":"${__HelpLink}/server/enterprise/configure-enterprise.aspx"

*Close all the unnecessary ports*. The list of all the ports which must be opened for ONLYOFFICE is "here":"${__HelpLink}/server/docker/community/open-ports.aspx".

Make your ONLYOFFICE more secure now.

$GreenButton

More information in our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}".

pattern_enterprise_whitelabel_admin_welc:
Dear $UserName,

${LetterLogoText} provides you with security tools that allow you to:

- Turn on HTTPS to keep your portal data secure;

- Backup your portal data on a regular basis to avoid any data-loss;

- Track login history and receive the audit trail data;

- Enable two-factor authentication. 

To turn on two-factor authentication, connect one of the service providers in Settings >> Integration >> Third-Party Authorization, and then go to Settings >> Security >> Two-factor authentication to enable the feature

The rest of the tools are available in Control Panel, where you can also change the default portal logos, import users from your LDAP server and check for available ${LetterLogoText} updates.

$GreenButton

Truly yours,
${LetterLogoText} Team

Hello, $UserName!

Here’s what you can do to make your web-office even more secure:

*Get an SSL certificate* if you are going to provide not only local but also external portal access for your users. Generate a new signed certificate in the Control Panel or purchase one from the provider you trust.

*Enable automatic backups* in the Control Panel. We also recommend that you use third-party services and make a backup copy of the server from time to time.

*Adjust portal security settings*: restrict access using IP whitelisting, specify trusted mail domains, set password length and more.

*Enable 2-factor authentication* via SMS or authenticator app.

*Use LDAP for access centralization*. Easily import the necessary users and groups from your LDAP server (e.g. OpenLDAP Server or Microsoft Active Directory) to your portal.

*Use own SMPT server* and close all the unnecessary ports.

Make your ONLYOFFICE more secure now.

$GreenButton

pattern_personal_r7_after_registration1:
h1.Добро пожаловать тестовое в облако для совместной работы Р7-Офис

Вы только что создали тестовый облачный офис для совместной работы над документами.

h3.Это виртуальное рабочее пространство, в котором вы можете редактировать и хранить документы, работать с ними, где бы вы ни находились, и предоставлять доступ своим коллегам или друзьям.

Редакторы Р7-Офис полностью совместимы с форматами Microsoft Office™. Приложения позволяют просматривать и редактировать документы в формате .docx, .xlsx, .pptx без потери форматирования. 

h3.Возможности тестового облака Р7-Офис:

- Загружайте файлы с компьютера или создавайте новые;

- Работайте со всеми популярными форматами электронных документов;

- Редактируйте автофигуры, диаграммы, таблицы, формулы и другие объекты;

- Используйте дополнения, чтобы расширить возможности редакторов.

Чтобы работать с документами локально, подключите тестовое облако к настольным приложениям "Р7-Офис":"https://www.r7-office.ru/downloads".

С уважением,
Команда Р7-Офис

Hello, $UserName!

We have prepared several tips to make your work with ONLYOFFICE  more comfortable.

*#1 Find quick answers about ONLYOFFICE functionality*

Browse "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}" when you are not sure how to perform your task. The answers to the most popular question like "how to import contacts to CRM":"${__HelpLink}/guides/import-contacts.aspx" or "how to export data from CRM":"${__HelpLink}/tipstricks/crm-export.aspx", or "how to add a recurring event":"${__HelpLink}/guides/add-recurring-event.aspx" can easily be found there.

*#2 Don’t forget about 3rd party extensions*

ONLYOFFICE functionality can be enhanced with 3rd party extensions. For example, you can easily publish documents on your WordPress website thanks to WordPress integration or e-sign your documents with DocuSign. "Find out more >>":"${__HelpLink}/server/windows/community/authorization-keys.aspx"  

*#3 Manage your subscriptions*

You’ll get notified about shared docs, projects updates, and your colleagues birthdays. Switch notifications on and off on your Profile page. Pick those that are useful for you and choose whether you want to get them via email, Chat, or both. You can also unsubscribe from these emails with tips and tricks there or, vice versa, re-enable them. "Learn more >>":"${__HelpLink}/tipstricks/managing-subscriptions.aspx"

*#4 Request special training*

To get a real quick start with ONLYOFFICE, ask us to teach your whole team to use all the modules and features. This is a paid option. "Contact us >>":"https://support.onlyoffice.com" 

Truly yours,
ONLYOFFICE Team
